name: EKCalendarEventAvailabilityMask
desc: A bitmask indicating the event availability settings that the calendar can support.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates a calendar event availability mask with the specified raw value.

items.name: static var busy: EKCalendarEventAvailabilityMask
items.desc: The calendar supports the busy event availability setting.

items.name: static var free: EKCalendarEventAvailabilityMask
items.desc: The calendar supports the free event availability setting.

items.name: static var tentative: EKCalendarEventAvailabilityMask
items.desc: The calendar supports the tentative event availability setting.

items.name: static var unavailable: EKCalendarEventAvailabilityMask
items.desc: The calendar supports the unavailable event availability setting.
